ContrasenyaCorreo: A password reset email has been sent to your email account.
TextoRecuperar: Enter your email and we will send you a password reset email:
ErrorEmailyContrasenya: There has been a problem with your email or password

resetContrasenya: A password reset email has been sent to your personal email associated with this account
